CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 29, 1954, pg. 1, reads: "First Negro Milk Driver - Salesman - Edgar Rideout began work in retail sales division of the Rieck Dairy Company last Thursday, marking the end of a long campaign to secure employment of Negroes in these jobs. He will work with veteran drivers until he learns procedures on his new assignment. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Edgar Rideout leaning out of door of Sealtest milk truck, with loading dock in background
